GlobalRasterTools - Class in com.mrc.GlobalRasterTools
This class contains a set of methods for handling rasteration of landscan-like population datasets, with ESRI (GADM) Shapefiles, including rasterising with contention-handling, look-up, and finding centroids.
GlobalRasterTools() - Constructor for class com.mrc.GlobalRasterTools.GlobalRasterTools
 
GlobalRasterTools.DPolygon - Class in com.mrc.GlobalRasterTools
A polygon with clockwise/anti-clockwise direction of points recorded.
